items.sentence: Give me the knife and let me slice the bread.
Has anyone in your family ever been arrested?
Have I ever told about how I met your mother?
Tom hasn\'t yet done what we asked him to do.
I think Tom would probably disagree with you.
I won\'t believe it until I hear it from Tom.
I wonder why Tom wouldn\'t cooperate with us.
I\'ve already told Tom where to park his car.
Tom visits Mary every time he goes to Boston.
Tom was immediately questioned by the police.
A million thoughts raced through Tom\'s mind.
We\'d save time if we drove down Park Street.
We\'ll try to answer the following questions.
I know you\'re hiding somewhere in this room.
You\'re just afraid you\'ll have to kiss Tom.
Tom tried to convince Mary that he was right.
Tom tried to convince Mary to stay in Boston.
Tom tried to get Mary to accept our proposal.
Tom unlocked the door and entered the office.
I didn\'t know Tom didn\'t understand French.
